# isFixed

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the space is fixed to a specific number of points.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var isFixed: Bool { get }
```

## Getting the spacing type

- **isFlexible**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the space is flexible.

items.description: A Boolean value that indicates whether the space is flexible.
items.name: isFlexible
